        |   ================================================================   |
        |                                                                      |
        |   Mechanisms: The Technology Series                                  |
        |                                                                      |
        |   A fascinating and educational CD from Creative Curriculum Software |
        |   detailing various historical mechanisms - the various elements     |
        |   that make up machines and which make them work. The CD contains    |
        |   over one thousand 'mechanisms'. Categories include:                |
        |                                                                      |
        |   - Canals                                                           |
        |   - Corn mills                                                       |
        |   - Engines                                                          |
        |   - Railways                                                         |
        |   - Watermills                                                       |
        |   - Windmills                                                        |
        |                                                                      |
        |   Note that this CD can be used on both Windows and RISC OS!         |
        |                                                                      |
